# sqb-conditional-section



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                    | Type     | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `condition` | `condition` | Only show this section when a user meets the following conditions.  Can use `user.segments` and `user.customFields`.   - `"VIP" in user.segments`  - `user.customFields.age > 19`  - `user.countryCode = "US"` | `string` | `undefined` |
